comments.body: Mirror pod tests do not belong in conformance. Static pods require reconfiguring kubelets, which make it not an API feature.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@			Description: Updating a static Pod MUST recreate an updated mirror Pod. Create a static pod, verify that a mirror pod is created. Update the static pod by changing the container image, the mirror pod MUST be re-created and updated with the new image.
		*/
		It("should be updated when static pod updated [NodeConformance]", func() {
			By("get mirror pod uid")
			pod, err := f.ClientSet.CoreV1().Pods(ns).Get(mirrorPodName, metav1.GetOptions{})
